claim: Ajax's abilities include heat generation and a power suit, in addition to agility, super strength, and super speed.
extra_info: Ajax refers to superhero_name = 'Ajax'; superpowers refers to power_name;
reasoning: The database shows Ajax has exactly 5 superpowers: Agility, Heat Generation, Power Suit, Super Speed, and Super Strength. The claim lists these same 5 powers (heat generation, power suit, agility, super strength, super speed), which fully matches the data.

content.text: I'll verify this claim by exploring the database schema and then querying for Ajax's superpowers.

input.description: List all tables in the superhero database

content.content:
alignment       colour          hero_attribute  publisher       superhero     
attribute       gender          hero_power      race            superpower

tool_use_result.stdout:
alignment       colour          hero_attribute  publisher       superhero     
attribute       gender          hero_power      race            superpower

input.command: sqlite3 "/Users/david/workspace/claimdb/test_dbs/superhero.sqlite" ".schema superpower" 2>/dev/null; sqlite3 "/Users/david/workspace/claimdb/test_dbs/superhero.sqlite" ".schema superhero" 2>/dev/null; sqlite3 "/Users/david/workspace/claimdb/test_dbs/superhero.sqlite" ".schema hero_power" 2>/dev/null

content.content:
CREATE TABLE superpower
(
    id         INTEGER not null
            primary key,
    power_name TEXT default NULL
);
CREATE TABLE superhero
(
    id             INTEGER not null
            primary key,
    superhero_name TEXT default NULL,
    full_name      TEXT default NULL,
    gender_id      INTEGER          default NULL,
    eye_colour_id  INTEGER          default NULL,
    hair_colour_id INTEGER          default NULL,
    skin_colour_id INTEGER          default NULL,
    race_id        INTEGER          default NULL,
    publisher_id   INTEGER          default NULL,
    alignment_id   INTEGER          default NULL,
    height_cm      INTEGER          default NULL,
    weight_kg      INTEGER          default NULL,
    foreign key (alignment_id) references alignment(id),
    foreign key (eye_colour_id) references colour(id),
    foreign key (gender_id) references gender(id),
    foreign key (hair_colour_id) references colour(id),
    foreign key (publisher_id) references publisher(id),
    foreign key (race_id) references race(id),
    foreign key (skin_colour_id) references colour(id)
);
CREATE TABLE hero_power
(
    hero_id  INTEGER default NULL,
    power_id INTEGER default NULL,
    foreign key (hero_id) references superhero(id),
    foreign key (power_id) references superpower(id)
);

tool_use_result.stdout:
CREATE TABLE superpower
(
    id         INTEGER not null
            primary key,
    power_name TEXT default NULL
);
CREATE TABLE superhero
(
    id             INTEGER not null
            primary key,
    superhero_name TEXT default NULL,
    full_name      TEXT default NULL,
    gender_id      INTEGER          default NULL,
    eye_colour_id  INTEGER          default NULL,
    hair_colour_id INTEGER          default NULL,
    skin_colour_id INTEGER          default NULL,
    race_id        INTEGER          default NULL,
    publisher_id   INTEGER          default NULL,
    alignment_id   INTEGER          default NULL,
    height_cm      INTEGER          default NULL,
    weight_kg      INTEGER          default NULL,
    foreign key (alignment_id) references alignment(id),
    foreign key (eye_colour_id) references colour(id),
    foreign key (gender_id) references gender(id),
    foreign key (hair_colour_id) references colour(id),
    foreign key (publisher_id) references publisher(id),
    foreign key (race_id) references race(id),
    foreign key (skin_colour_id) references colour(id)
);
CREATE TABLE hero_power
(
    hero_id  INTEGER default NULL,
    power_id INTEGER default NULL,
    foreign key (hero_id) references superhero(id),
    foreign key (power_id) references superpower(id)
);

content.text: Now let me query for Ajax's superpowers:

input.command: sqlite3 "/Users/david/workspace/claimdb/test_dbs/superhero.sqlite" "SELECT sp.power_name FROM superhero s JOIN hero_power hp ON s.id = hp.hero_id JOIN superpower sp ON hp.power_id = sp.id WHERE s.superhero_name = 'Ajax' ORDER BY sp.power_name;"

content.content:
Agility
Heat Generation
Power Suit
Super Speed
Super Strength

tool_use_result.stdout:
Agility
Heat Generation
Power Suit
Super Speed
Super Strength

content.text:
The database returns exactly 5 powers for Ajax:
1. Agility
2. Heat Generation
3. Power Suit
4. Super Speed
5. Super Strength

The claim states Ajax's abilities include: heat generation, power suit, agility, super strength, and super speed. This matches the database exactly — all 5 powers listed in the claim are present, and there are no additional powers in the database beyond those mentioned.
